name: Gabriele De Benedittis
title: Operations & Strategy
text: Technology and operations executive with 15+ years leading global transformation and efficiency programs. Expert in data systems, automation, and organizational design.

name: Francesco Rossi
title: AI & Software Engineering
text: A visionary technologist and full-stack engineer with deep expertise in AI and automation. Francesco transforms complex data challenges into elegant, intelligent solutions — the technical backbone of MediStrata’s platform.

name: Nicola Bianchi
title: Product & Integrations
text: Product and technology leader with deep expertise in workflow automation and data integration. Skilled in translating complex business needs into scalable digital solutions.
